msg: Update the activation attribute for components so that the component
initialization can now be configured to be either inline, background or lazy.

msg: Added method for creating backwards-compatible proxies.

author: leosutic
msg: Made the factory create backwards-compatible proxies. As it was, the pooling
code broke due to the proxy (which was pooled) didn't implement Poolable.
Since the proxy didn't implement Recyclable either, that got messed up

msg: Removed the warning when null was released. It seems backwards to issue
